Off to the Cinema

August 17, 2011

This is what a week-old baby looks like at midnight at the outdoor cinema: asleep. Thatâ€™s her friend Stacey looking after her; we had a little trouble getting her back from Stacey afterwards.

The film was Charade, starring Audrey Hepburn and Cary Grant. In July and August they have regular outdoor screening of fairly random films projected onto the side of the castle on Montjuic overlooking the city.

Piglet Goes Home

August 14, 2011

On the Saturday, a mere four days after her birth, the hospital tells us we can go home. Itâ€™s a terrifying prospect, being told you can just walk out the front door of the hospital with a tiny baby. Sheâ€™s all ours to look after. I half expected us to get challenged at the exit; that it was all a big wind-up. They couldnâ€™t really be letting us take her home. What do we know about looking after babies?

Nobody stopped us at the door, so Piglet came home on the metro, all of two stops from the hospital.
